Package Controller

Class Session

java.lang.Object
Controller.Session
public class Session
extends java.lang.Object
Class that controls the current session, including the logging in, the logging out and the account creation.

    • openSession

      public int openSession​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Tries to open a new session (log in)
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the user
      password - Password of the user
      Returns:
      0 if successful -1 if wrong username -2 if wrong password

    • logOut

      public void logOut()
      Logs the user out of the session.

    • createAccount

      public boolean createAccount​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String mail, java.lang.String password)
      Create an account (a user save) if all the fields are ok
      Parameters:
      username - username
      firstName - first name
      lastName - last name
      mail - mail
      password - password
      Returns:
      TRUE if creation successful FALSE otherwise
